root.name: Antz World Sportz
root.description: Overview Antz World Sports is a sports game developed by M4 Limited and published by L.S.P for the Game Boy Color platform. Antz World Sportz was never released in the United States, it was instead only released in European countries.Gameplay The Javelin Toss Antz World Sportz is a sporting game in which the player is put through multiple mini games in a series. The results of each mini game are added together and the player with the highest score is the winner. There are a total of five stages, each with their own set of events. In order to compete in any of the stages other than stage 1 a medal must have been earned in the previous stage.Languages Antz World Sportz gives the player the option to choose from six different languages at the start. Those languages are: EnglishFrancaisDeutschEspanolItalianoNederlands Characters In Antz World Sports there are a total of four different characters that can be selected from. ZBalaMandibleWeaver
